list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an arch of colors formed in the sky in certain circumstances, caused by the refraction and dispersion of the sun's light by rain or other water droplets in the atmosphere.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: all the colors of the rainbow
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: tất cả các màu sắc của cầu vồng
